name: Leagues Above
description:
Leagues Above
 A game by BumbleBirds

Rate us on Ludum Dare!

It's Bird VS Fish in this heated battle! Use what nature gave you to suffocate or drown your opponent in this hyper-realistic fighting sim!

Local multiplayer only. It's too much to handle on your own.

Controls

Player 1

Move: WASD

Attack: E

Player 2

Move: IJKL

Attack: U

Credits

Designed and developed by BumbleBirds

Music by EliteFerrex

Thanks to @moshboy for the inspiration too!

Thanks for playing! Any donations are seriously appreciated.
